name: Mustang Horse Simulator 3D
description:
Role play a Mustang Horse :)

NEW CRAFT MISSIONS - Collect magic gems and craft flowers and other items to help build up the magical forest!

3D REAL SIMULATOR - You need to maintain your health, hunger, and energy to survive and protect yourself in the magical forest!

EPIC BATTLES - Run after, howl, and race to catch prey such wild bears, wolves, foxes, and rabbits! Fight off your enemies who do not want you to survive in this dangerous forest!

CREATE A MUSTANG HORSE PACK - Create, unlock, and raise a pack of Mustang horses to help you hunt and gather food, keep your strength up, and win battles against your enemies.

BE A REAL-LIFE MUSTANG - Gain experience points by trying to survive in this magical forest by searching for food, defeating your enemies, and attacking your prey!

GAIN A MUSTANG HORSE PERSPECTIVE - Easy controls so you can live your life as a Mustang Horse! Zoom in and out to accomplish your Mustang Horse missions! Collect gems to gain energy and experience points!

This game features:
NEW CRAFT MISSIONS
3D REAL SIMULATOR
EPIC BATTLES
MUSTANG HORSE PACKS
HUNTING WILD BEARS, WOLVES, FOXES, and RABBITS
COLLECTING DIFFERENT COLORED GEMS FOR ENERGY POINTS
AWESOME HIGH-DEFINITION GRAPHICS
ESCAPING FROM WILD PREDATORS OUT TO DESTROY YOU
STRUGGLING TO SURVIVE IN AN UNKNOWN FOREST
3D WORLD TO DISCOVER AND EXPLORE

Role play a REAL LIVE MUSTANG HORSE!
